lead_paragraph: Serena Williams composed herself after a first-set loss and a burst of anger that made her smash her racket, to beat tenacious fellow American Christina McHale in a tense second-round match at Wimbledon on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Serena Survives Three-Set Thriller, Racket Not So Lucky
headline.main: Serena Survives Three-Set Thriller, Racket Not So Lucky

snippet: Serena Williams composed herself after a first-set loss and a burst of anger that made her smash her racket, to beat tenacious fellow American Christina McHale in a tense second-round match at Wimbledon on Friday....
